analysis.key_quote: Moving management officials from the “competitive service” to the “excepted service” will return the Civil Service to a spoils system of patronage jobs, that will reward political favoritism over the “merit system” in place now.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the erosion of the merit system and due process protections, as well as the potential for increased politicization of the civil service.
